review.title: “Small Company with large benefits.”
review.pros: Pros – This company offer the possibility to grow as an individual and bring your best card to work for you and for the company. It is a great place to work cause you get to work as if you were your own boss. Compensations are above average.
review.cons: Cons – This is a small company that still need to make is mark and this can be a good challenge sometime.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Great company!
